artefact.overview: Use FSA online guidance to make sure you meet farm food and feed legal requirements.
artefact.more_information:
The FSA guidance tool lets you:

* check your current farming practices against the requirements of on-farm food and feed legislation
* deal with unsafe food and feed and keep good standards of hygiene
* meet the cross compliance requirements of your Single Payment Scheme (SPS) claim

If you have any queries about the tool, contact the Department for Environment and Rural Affairs (Defra) Helpline.

$C
**Defra Helpline**  
<onlinehelp@defra.gsi.gov.uk>  
08459 33 55 77  
Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm
$C

*[Defra]: Department for Environment and Rural Affairs
*[FSA]: Food Standards Agency
artefact.introduction:
Use the FSA online tool to make sure you meet farm food and feed standards.



*[Defra]: Department for Environment and Rural Affairs
